raw_text: ESME RITA ABEYWARDENE nee TALAYRATNE called to Eternal Rest. Everloving wife of late Maxwell Luke Abeywardene,​ loving mother of Malcolm,​ Marlene,​ Myrna,​ Mohan,​ Nimal,​ Ravi,​ Susantha & late Shiromi,​ mother-in-law of Nirmala,​ late Mahesh,​ late William,​ Suzanne,​ Gwendalene,​ Nishani,​ Shakila & Danushka,​ loving grandmother of Maheshini,​ late Suresh & Nirosha,​ Kristina,​ Dilan,​ Shanelle,​ Brian & Kevin,​ greatgrandmother of Jenal. Sister of late Aloy,​ late Samson,​ late Beryl,​ late Maureen,​ late Lucian,​ late Donald & Parnel,​ expired. Cortege leaves residence No. 18,​ Charles Place,​ Dehiwela at 3.30 p.m. on Tuesday 28.11.23. Burial at Mount Lavinia Cemetery.077793

SOMANADER – SHIRLEY WIGNARAJAH – Beloved son of the late Douglas and Hilda Somanader and Son In Law of the late Robert & Selvaranee Setukavalar of Batticaloa. Loving husband of late Rajini (Nee Setukavalar),​ devoted father of Dr Douglas (Lakshan) and Dr Dhanusha,​ father-in-Law of Menaka and Dr Sri Kumaran,​ and loved grandfather of Sherah and Joella,​ brother of Ashley and Vimala Arnold and the late Kingsley,​ Leslie and Anesley (Indran). Brother-in-Law of Juliana (Melbourne),​ Sunthari (Melbourne) Iris (Canada) Balan,​ Rabi,​ Vino,​ Setu (Suhen),​ Jayen & Premini (Sri Lanka). Uncle of Adrian & Nirmini Somanader. Funeral will take place at St John the Baptist Anglican Church,​ Lilydale,​ Melbourne on Tuesday the 28th November at 10AM. Live stream link for Shirley Somanader: https:/​/​vimeo.com/​event/​3907633. Friends and relatives please accept this intimation. Contact : s​e​t​u​k​a​v​a​l​a​r​@​g​m​a​i​l​.​c​o​m​077817

WEBSTER,​ SHEILA – Beloved wife of the late Mervyn,​ mother of Gordon,​ Norman and Gillian,​ mother-in-law of Michelle,​ Virginia and Jeremy,​ loving sister of the late George Davidson,​ Marie,​ sister-in-law of Valerie,​ beloved grandmother of Tamara,​ Nigel,​ Tiffany,​ Brittany and Hamish,​ great grandmother of Silas,​ passedaway peacefully at the age of 93 on the 21st of November 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday the 30th of November from 11 a.m. to 2.45 p.m. followed by a Service. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella. (Old Crematorium).077878
